regen.absent_element: designation of roles for users when adding them to the system
regen.new_specification: The system shall associate the user with their respective role in the division during the addition of a new user to the system.

regen.absent_element: designating roles for new users when adding them to the system
regen.new_specification: The system shall designate a role associated with the user's division when adding a new user to the system.

regen.absent_element: verification of role and division for existing users
regen.new_specification: The system shall verify the user's role and division when attempting to add or modify an existing user in the system.

label: The system shall save the user info to the database with specified roles associated with divisions for the newly created/added user.
absence: action of associating the new user with the divisions
